product_name: Chrome Mini Buran Night Messenger Bag
long_description: Built with waterproof reflective fabric that boosts visibility at night, the Chrome Mini Buran Night messenger bag includes a padded 13 in. laptop sleeve and the iconic seat-belt buckle bottle opener.
short_description: Built with waterproof reflective fabric that boosts visibility at night, the Chrome Mini Buran Night messenger bag includes a padded 13 in. laptop sleeve and the iconic seat-belt buckle bottle opener.
